CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Other Party Signatures") ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_DocuApi__DocuSignRecallEnvByEnvId?envelopeparentid="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus_DocuApi__RecallEnvelope","Recall E-Signature Document"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Recall E-Signature Request
